title: mangaLa yaazhisai
sahitya:
mangaLa yAzhishai ponggavE mAya mALavagaulaiyuDan shubha



anupallavi



tanga naghai sheyyum taLiriLam kAlaiyil jaya shiva hariguru shuddha shaktiyena 



caraNam



manaviruL vilagiDa mAshugal pEra manida janmamidu inik-kaDaittEra

punitamAna upashAntamE shAra puNNiya shruti svara laya gati shEravE
